fulltext:
Gagan Anand 
CONTACT 
SUMMARY 
I am a seasoned Data Science professional, providing on-site consulting to some of the best names in the 
industry. I have primarily worked on predictive analytics and classification techniques like linear and logistic 
regression, clustering, association rules, sequence pattern mining, NLP and creating KPIs for various 
business problems in the Finance, Telecommunications and Digital Marketing space. 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Dec’17- present 
Data Scientist 
Credit Suisse, Pune 
As a data scientist in the CFO’s Innovation team, our objective is to increase efficiency in the finance domain 
using process standardization, machine learning and predictive analysis. 
Generated an anomaly detection algorithm to identify unusual trades for the trade audit team using one-
class SVM and Isolation forests.  
Created a suite of tools that analyzes the daily FOBO breaks, measures book complexity, detects 
anomalies and helps line controllers signoff on daily trades for Product Control. Saving €200,000 yearly. 
Aug’15 - Nov’17 
Data Science Consultant  
Cognizant Technology Solutions, Bangalore 
As an associate in the Data Science practice I delivered the following projects: 

Call Volume Prediction: Using machine learning algorithms to predict call volumes and suggest ways 
to optimize the process through geo-clustering, pattern mining and classification modeling for the 
largest telecommunications company in the US. 

Online Search Ads Analytics: Member of the long-term strategy team that identified market 
opportunities and defined methodologies for monetizing them using predictive and prescriptive 
analytics techniques for the world’s second largest search ad engine. Projects undertaken: 
o
Created a location based filtering algorithm to improve ad targeting and user’s propensity to click. 
o
Increased accuracy of revenue prediction models by using geo-location analytics & user 
segmentation. 
o
Identified spending patterns for large advertisers across advertiser categories. 

Automobile Sales Algorithm: Created an algorithm for targeted sales effort that could predict a 
prospective customer's propensity to purchase a vehicle and classify leads accordingly. 
Jun’14 - Aug’14 
Digital Analytics Intern  
Hewlett Packard, Bangalore 

Conducted a post-click consumer analysis for HP’s monthly newsletter and provided recommendations 
to increase engagement with consumers. 

Worked on enhancing the machine learning algorithm for the image recognition and text identification 
software on HP Autonomy’s IDOL platform for unstructured data. 
Research Associate  
              Jul’12 - Jun’13 
Accent Consulting, Noida 
Created time series models to predict commodity prices and designed dashboards to evaluate KPIs. 
Liaison Officer  
          Oct’09 - Oct’10 
Commonwealth Games 2010, Delhi 
Liaised with Sports Ministers, Chef de Missions and other dignitaries from Commonwealth countries during 
the preparation of the Commonwealth Games in Delhi. 
CERTIFICATIONS 

Management, Entrepreneurship and Global Leadership at London School of Economics and 
Political Sciences, London (United Kingdom).  
August ‘11 

Applied Machine Learning Specialist from Wiley & Sons    
October’15 

Big Data Specialist from Wiley & Sons  
October’15 
KEY ACHIEVEMENTS 
Received the Delivery 
Excellence Award for Q2 
2018 at Credit Suisse for 
implementation of the PC- 
Straight Through Processing 
Suite. Saving €200,000 yearly. 
Presented with the Pinnacle 
Award in April 2016 for 
successfully delivering multiple 
projects. 
Liaison Officer to Sports 
Ministers and Chef de 
Missions at Commonwealth 
Games, Delhi 
TOOLS 
Proficient in R, Tableau, H2O,  
Adobe Analytics, SQL , Scope & 
MS-Office. 
Working knowledge of Python, 
SAS, C# and PowerBI. 
INTERESTS 

Volunteer Analyst at United Way 
of 
Delhi, 
an 
NGO 
which 
synergizes  the  efforts  of 
corporate  bodies  and  other 
NGOs. 
Certified advance open water 
scuba diver and trek leader. 

Lean Six Sigma Green Belt from KPMG   
August’15 
EDUCATION 
2015 
MBA (Business Economics, Marketing) 
Department of Business Economics, University of Delhi 
2012 
BA (Hons) Business Economics  
Sri Guru Tegh Bahadur Khalsa College, University of Delhi 
2009 
XII (AISSCE) 
Apeejay School Noida (CBSE) 
2007 
X (AISCE) 
Apeejay School Noida (CBSE)

Generated an anomaly detection algorithm to identify unusual trades for the trade audit team using one- class SVM and Isolation forests.
Created a suite of tools that analyzes the daily FOBO breaks, measures book complexity, detects anomalies and helps line controllers signoff on daily trades for Product Control. Saving €200,000 yearly.

As an associate in the Data Science practice I delivered the following projects:
Call Volume Prediction: Using machine learning algorithms to predict call volumes and suggest ways to optimize the process through geo-clustering, pattern mining and classification modeling for the largest telecommunications company in the US. Online Search Ads Analytics: Member of the long-term strategy team that identified market opportunities and defined methodologies for monetizing them using predictive and prescriptive analytics techniques for the world’s second largest search ad engine.
